nodes.title: Made file handling theoretically compatible with Switch
Implemented new methods needed by UI (except for fonts)
Added ninepatch rendering and various fixes
Fixed MonoGameTextureRegion, now it works the way it should.
Partially implemented the controller input API
Improved MonoGamePixmap drawing methods (drawRectangle, fillRectangle, drawCircle)
Fix for #117, now the shape rendering draws directly to the spritebatch without using pixmaps
Removed Music operations that aren't supported in MonoGame
Implemented Viewport related APIs (except for Viewports themselves)
Fixed some bugs and implemented a test UAT
Removed newPixMap(byte[], int, int) from GraphicsUtil interface
Renamed all the parameters of MonoGameGraphics, MonoGameAudio, MonoGa…
Fixed .NET framework version mismatch in UAT
Cauchy|#53 added tests for rectangle and circle, added JacocoTestReport
Fixes TextureRegion rendering upside down in Graphics
Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md
Cut in half objects generated by proxy listeners in geom
Migrate UiContainer.actionKeys from IntArray to IntSet
Added extra methods to UiContainer and Textbox
Fixed crash due to character limit on text box
Make MonoGame sprite tint behavior consistent with libgdx
Fix font color not being always properly set in MonoGame
Fix pixmap color issues in MonoGame
GridUiNavigation handles moving from and over null elements
GridUiNavigation null checks when navigating with null items
Added test and fix when setting element beyond current array size in GridUiNavigation
Updated UiContainer to set last input source on key down
Add parameter to clearActiveNavigation got unsetting hovered item
Add bool parameter when setting active navigation for resetting cursor
Implement method to get collisions ignoring edge overlap.
Fixed scrollTo not fully scrolling element into view
Implemented character limit for TextBox UI element.
Fix cursor hiding on LWJGL3, closes #270
Access to Field/Method cache is now synchronized
Fixed UI unit tests failing because of non-English locale set
Added support to load UiXMLs via Assetmanager
Add LibGDX LWJGL 3 runtime. Update to LibGDX 1.9.10
better support for xml namespace prefixes
better support for xml namespace prefixes
[AC-1592] Seperate scrollbar rendering to allow for overridding
Addded conversion from mini2Dx to MonoGame matrices
Now TextureAtlas implementation is provided in core
Added average render duration to performance tracker
Implemented new Maps and TreeMaps and added relative tests
Fixed UI input when a viewport is applied (fixes #89)
Fixed #192 and added related unit test
Implemented SpriteCache in MonoGame, various other improvements
Now TilingDrawable is implemented in core
Added Artemis support and fixed some bugs in DI
Fixed peekClip after removing clipping still returning the old clip
Various fixes regarding clipping and fixed inverted scrolling
Fixed GameFont size reporting, now it's correct
Fixed possible issues in sprite and textureregions rendering
Fixed MonoGame transformation handling, now more uats are working
More fixes on the MonoGame backend
Optimized MonoGame shape renderer and various fixes
Fixed the rendering of a ninepatch created from a textureregion
Now the common uat runs on the monogame backend
Implemented mini2Dx timestep logic in the UAT
Fixed some bugs that prevented correct Tiled map rendering
